ocean.question: I have many arms, but I can't hug you. I live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 Some people eat me!
🌈 I can change color to hide.
🖐 I have eight arms.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🐳 Many creatures live in me.
🚢 You can travel on me.

ocean.question: I am a home for a hermit, but I used to belong to someone else. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am found on the beach.
🦀 A hermit crab lives inside me.
🐌 I was once a snail's home.

ocean.question: I have a shell and swim very slowly. I leave a trail wherever I go. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile.
🥗 Some people eat me in soup.
🌊 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a long nose like a sword. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a type of fish.
🗡️ My nose looks like a weapon.
🌊 I swim in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am very small and dig homes out of sand in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am a very small creature.
🏘️ I dig my home in the sand.
🦀 I am a type of crustacean.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean, and I can balance a ball on my nose. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make clicking sounds to talk.
🌊 I jump out of the water and do tricks.
🐟 I eat fish.

ocean.question: I'm a very large creature in the sea, I have baleen instead of teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a type of whale.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🍽️ I filter food from the water.

ocean.question: I am a type of coral reef that's found near the shore. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝️ I protect coastlines.
🐠 Many colorful fish live near me.
☀️ I am usually found in warm, shallow water.

ocean.question: I am a powerful current that brings warm water from the Gulf of Mexico to Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I influence the climate of Europe.
🌊 I am a strong ocean current.
🇲🇽 I start near Mexico.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A popular snack for primates!
💛 My skin is usually this colour.
📏 I grow on trees and am a curved fruit.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Kittens and puppies love to drink me.
🐄 I am produced by farm animals.
🍚 I often accompany breakfast foods.

food.question: I am round and juicy. I am red, green, or yellow, and grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 A popular fruit that keeps the doctor away.
🥧 I can be used to make pies!
🌳 I grow on branches.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time.
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me can help you see in the dark!

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. Many people don't like me, but I'm full of protein. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a type of legume.
🥣 Often served as a side dish.
💪 Good for building muscles!

food.question: I'm a popular party food, made of corn, and I go 'pop' when heated. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 Often enjoyed at the movies.
🌽 I start as a small kernel.
🔥 Heat makes me change shape.

food.question: I'm a breakfast food that is made from grains, cooked in water or milk. I can be sweet or savory. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 Goldilocks loved to eat me in the Three Bears story.
🥄 I'm often eaten with a spoon.
🍁 Syrup or fruit can make me taste even better.

food.question: I am a dessert that is cold and sweet. I come in many flavors and people love me on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often served in a cone.
☀️ Best enjoyed during warm weather.
🍨 Made with milk, cream, sugar and flavoring.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, then baked in an oven. I am often sliced and used to make sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many cultures.
🥪 Sliced, I'm perfect for holding sandwich fillings.
🔥 Baking is how I am made.

food.question: I am a food that can be red, yellow, or green. I am technically a fruit, but often eaten as a vegetable in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am a key ingredient in ketchup.
🥗 Often eaten raw in salads.
🪴 I grow on vines and come in many varieties.
